definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]

sentences.english: A lock of dark hair curled across his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 一绺蓬松的黑发弯曲地挂在他的前额上。

sentences.english: A lock of hair had fallen down over her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 一绺刘海遮住她的双眼。

sentences.english: The king is captivated by your tresses .
sentences.chinese: 王被这下垂的发绺监禁了。

sentences.english: A curl of black hair fell loosely across his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 他的额头上垂着一绺散开的黑色卷发。

sentences.english: Hester next gathered up the heavy tresses of her hair, and confined them beneath her cap.
sentences.chinese: 接着，海丝特挽起她浓密的发绺，用帽子罩了起来。

sentences.english: Dreadlocks are another sacred religious practice among the Rasta's.
sentences.chinese: 长发绺是塔法里教徒的另一种神圣的宗教行为。

sentences.english: He keeps a lock of her hair .
sentences.chinese: 他保存著她的一绺头发。

sentences.english: Cutting fabrics along bias is the most suitable for clothing with waviness.
sentences.chinese: 斜丝绺面料最适宜塑造服装的波浪造型。

sentences.english: Then I remembered how I had blown the hair away from that neck.
sentences.chinese: 这时我想起我是怎样把那绺头发从那脖子上吹起。

sentences.english: I remember her promising to give you some.
sentences.chinese: 我记得她答应送你一绺头发。

sentences.english: Yes, and Jane came by with a lock of your hair.
sentences.chinese: 是的，简回来了，带着一绺你的头发。

sentences.english: There was the little coil of pale hair which had been used as the fuze to this great explosion.
sentences.chinese: 里面有一绺淡淡地毛发，它就是这场大爆炸的引信。

sentences.english: Give him a tuft of hair and furry eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 再画出它的一绺头发和毛茸茸的眉毛。

sentences.english: For some, untucked, descended her sheaved hat.
sentences.chinese: 从她的草帽边垂下的几绺云鬟。

sentences.english: The king is fettered by your tresses .
sentences.chinese: 王被这下垂的发绺监禁了。

sentences.english: We watched a curl of grey-blue smoke rising into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着一绺灰蓝色的烟升上天空。

definition: variant of 鬢角|鬓角[bin4 jiao3]
hair worn in a bun or coil
hair rolled up in a bun, topknot
strand/thread/detailed/in detail/classifier for wisps (of smoke, mist or vapor), strands, locks (of hair)
classifier for hair or grass: tuft/Taiwan pr. [cuo4]
to pick up (a powder etc) with the fingertips/to scoop up/to collect together/to extract/to gather up/classifier: pinch/Taiwan pr. [cuo4]
